name: acorn
description: Acorn is software that helps people create the future

scripts.install-deps: npm install && npm run web-install && npm run zod-models-install && npm run zod-models-build && npm run electron-install && npm run electron-tsc
scripts.web: cd web && WEB_PORT=8081 ADMIN_WS_PORT=1101 APP_WS_PORT=8101 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.web2: cd web && WEB_PORT=8082 ADMIN_WS_PORT=1102 APP_WS_PORT=8102 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.web3: cd web && WEB_PORT=8083 ADMIN_WS_PORT=1103 APP_WS_PORT=8103 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.web4: cd web && WEB_PORT=8084 ADMIN_WS_PORT=1104 APP_WS_PORT=8104 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.electron: cd electron && WEB_PORT=8081 ACORN_AGENT_NUM=1 npm run start
scripts.electron2: cd electron && WEB_PORT=8082 ACORN_AGENT_NUM=2 npm run start
scripts.electron3: cd electron && WEB_PORT=8083 ACORN_AGENT_NUM=3 npm run start
scripts.electron4: cd electron && WEB_PORT=8084 ACORN_AGENT_NUM=4 npm run start
